title: Create Account
navigation-back-text: All your settings will be lost. Are you sure you want to exit?

settings.kyc-required-text-1: In order to create a program with the selected broker, you need to verify your account by completing the KYC (Know Your Customer) procedure.
settings.kyc-required-text-2: KYC is an authentication mechanism required in the financial industry to help ensure companies are compliant with anti money laundering regulations.

hints.trades-delay: Description about Trades delay is here
hints.entry-fee-levels: The entry fee is disabled for programs that have not reached level 3. It will be charged only for programs with level 3 or higher.
hints.entry-fee: Description about entry fee is here
hints.entry-fee-description: A fee charged upon each investment in the program.
hints.management-fee: Description about management fee is here
hints.management-fee-description: A fee charged for the actual asset management period. Management fee is defined in annual percentage and is charged at the end of each reporting period.
hints.exchange-management-fee-description: A fee charged for the actual asset management period. Management fee is defined in annual percentage.
hints.success-fee: Description about success fee is here
hints.success-fee-description: A fee charged upon the total profit made within the reporting period.
hints.exchange-success-fee-description: A fee charged upon the total profit.
hints.subscription-fee: Description about subscription fee is here
hints.subscription-fee-description: A fee for the subscription to the signal provider services.
hints.signal-volume-fee: Description about volume fee is here
hints.signal-volume-fee-description: A fee charged for the copied volume.
hints.signal-success-fee: Description about signal success fee is here
hints.signal-success-fee-description: A fee charged for the profit made from copied successful trades.
hints.stop-out-level: Description about Stop Out is here
hints.stop-out-level-description: Stop Out is the maximum drawdown level for the reporting period at which the program is stopped, and all investments return to investors.

notifications.validate-error: Please correct the errors on this form
